DataElement.preferredName: New Bone Lesion Since Week Nine Bone Scan Occurrence Yes No Indicator
DataElement.preferredDefinition: The yes/no indicator related to the appearance of new bone lesions as compared to the week 9 bone scan.

DataElementConcept.preferredName: New Bone Lesion Since Week Nine Bone Scan Occurrence
DataElementConcept.preferredDefinition: Information related to the appearance of new bone lesions as compared to the week 9 bone scan.

ObjectClass.preferredDefinition: New; having no previous example or precedent or parallel.:Connective tissue that forms the skeletal components of the body.:(LEE-zhun) An area of abnormal tissue change.

Concepts.definition: Having no previous example or precedent or parallel; of a kind not seen before.
The structural organ comprised of specialized connective tissue that forms the skeletal components of the body.
A localized pathological or traumatic structural change, damage, deformity, or discontinuity of tissue, organ, or body part.

Property.preferredName: Since Week Nine Bone Scan Occurrence
Property.preferredDefinition: Subsequent to; after.:Any period of seven consecutive days.:A natural number greater than 8 and less than 10 and the quantity that it denotes: the sum of nine and one.:A nuclear imaging method used to evaluate pathological bone metabolism.:An instance of something happening, such as an event or incident.

Concepts.definition: Any period of seven consecutive days.
A natural number greater than 8 and less than 10 and the quantity that it denotes: the sum of nine and one.
A nuclear imaging method used to evaluate pathological bone metabolism.
An instance of something happening, such as an event or incident.

ConceptualDomain.preferredDefinition: the results of evaluations of the patient and the patient's disease.

ValueDomain.preferredDefinition: The preferred Value Domain to indicate a question with permissible values of yes/no.

ValueMeaning.preferredDefinition: The non-affirmative response to a question.

Concepts.definition: The non-affirmative response to a question.

ValueMeaning.preferredDefinition: The affirmative response to a question.

ConceptualDomain.preferredDefinition: Conceptual domain that includes value meanings to be used for Indicator Value Meanings such as Yes, No, Unknown, No Applicable

RepresentationTerm.preferredDefinition: A caDSR representation term that is used to indicate a question with permissible values of yes/no

Concepts.definition: A response or indicator that can have a value of either yes or no.
